name: Sara Zalewski CREE, Appellant v. WEST PENN ALLEGHENY HEALTH SYSTEM, INC., Forbes Regional Hospital, Almar Radiologists, Inc., and Maureen M. Bidula, M.D., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Cree v. West Penn Allegheny Health System, Inc.

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Edward A. Shenderovich, Esq., Shenderovich, Shenderovich & Fishman, P.C., Pittsburgh, for Sara Zalewski Cree, appellant.
